Reviews.Title: Great price, too bad it died after 3 days
Reviews.Author: T. Greene
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a cheap waterproof digital camera to take on vacation to Costa Rica.  This fit the bill.  It actually took really decent pics and videos, both out and in the water.  Tried it in the ocean (not deep, just in 1' deep water) and in a swimming pool.  Rinsed it with clean water each time it was used underwater, as recommended in the manual.  It actually died during use outside of the water, in a completely dry environment.  The onboard software crashed, strange flickering of the screen.  Rebooted once, worked for 20 seconds, and then never rebooted again.

Reviews.Title: I got this camara for a gift ;(
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: I got this camara for a gift ;( and send to my sister for her birthday ; I safe this item for more than 30day until I shipping overseas...I never open or check since I trust the product, however my sister open and found a bad batteries , after she got a new ones , took 2 fotos and the batteries died again . Well no only that , the scren show 4 lines and what happens ?...the lines still on the scren ; to bad for a gift , sorry for my sister, I glad to get a refund but sound to late to return , past 30 days and also spend more time to shiping and handle back , than the original cost.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof up to 10ft
Dual LCD Display 2.7" Back Panel & 1.8" Front
10 Megapixels
Supports Micro Sd upto 32 Gig
Camera includes case, batteries and strap
ProductInfo.Name: Isonic Dual Display Waterproof Digital Camera WP10
